entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:32 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 3.0Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
